scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Torey
scrape.text: This dinner was slow moving and just not that captivating.This entire book is set during one adult only dinner at a ritzy restaurant. 2 adult couples (a senator and his brother and their wives) with a bit of back story for each of them amidst there commonplace dinner conversations. Throw in a few quite elaborate food details from the waiters and there you have it, The Dinner.Spoiler alert: these couples 3 teenage sons are found to have video footage online of their assault/murder of a homeless woman. This is incredibly disturbing and horrible yet there isn't really a resolution to this crime.. Mostly just the parents deciding to hide it and hope that in 3 months it'll blow over. Ugh. Just awful.
